survey_name: Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Station Accessibility Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user experiences and satisfaction levels with public electric vehicle charging stations to improve service accessibility and reliability.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice responses. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
